author: brianp
msg: Updated the release showstoppers section to reflect the
completion of the critical suexec fixes

author: brianp
msg: Fix for suexec invocation of CGIs under user dirs when using cgid

author: brianp
msg: Fix for suexec execution of CGI scripts from mod_include
(including security patch to ensure that <!--#include file="name.cgi"-->
is run as the suexec user rather than the httpd user)
